issue.title: [Python][Parquet] Enhance hive partition filtering with 'like' operator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10707](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10707). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Add a 'like' operator which has a semantics of a sql like. Alternatively, a regular expression can be used. I prefer sql like semantics for reasons to achieve sql consistency.
